body: I was excited thinking that it was the one that came out last Friday where everything is told from Nana's point of view and you can see how she started having sex in high school and ended up doing it even with a married man... and it was just Chapter 3 that came out in December ....keep waiting for the gaiden

Basically, Senpai learned about MC rejecting a girl cuz he apparently has someone he likes. MC on the other hand, learned about Senpai actually not having a boyfriend. With these revelations to each other, MC tried to muster his courage and was about to ask her out but he realized that Senpai really just has zero interest and intention in going out with him and only see him as a sexfriend. They went to a hotel after and had their first raw sex. This might have felt like it has gone a step higher, but in the end they remained as sexfriends and MC has more or less accepted that reality. The End. Quite a bittersweet ending.
hot but i cant handle being in love with a sex friend. Just cut the relationship off at that point since usually they arent interested in an actually relationship anyway.
I haven't seen Gen around in ages! Another masterpiece series that deserves translations: Part 1: https://nhentai.net/g/355134/ **** Part 2: https://nhentai.net/g/355135/
